title: Intro to SQL
description: Learn the basics of SQL with practical examples and interactive exercises.

lessons.title: SQL SELECT Basics
lessons.description: Understand the fundamentals of the SQL SELECT statement and how to retrieve data from a table.
lessons.concept_text: The SELECT statement is used to query data from a database. You can specify the columns to retrieve and the table to query from.

tests.description: Should select all columns from the table
